text: William James "Willem" Dafoe (;Archived at Ghostarchive and the Wayback Machine: born July 22, 1955) is an American actor. He was born in Appleton, Wisconsin. He played major roles in To Live and Die in L.A., Platoon, The Last Temptation of Christ, Mississippi Burning, Body of Evidence, Clear and Present Danger, Speed 2: Cruise Control, The Boondock Saints, Shadow of the Vampire, Spider-Man, Spider-Man: No Way Home, The Clearing, Beetlejuice Beetlejuice and Nosferatu. He was also in the 2017 movie Justice League and 2018 movie Aquaman as Nuidis Vulko. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:People from Appleton, Wisconsin Category:Actors from Wisconsin Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:American stage actors
title: Willem Dafoe
